duck: text definition: the original words and form of a written or printed work.
Text display, an electronic alphanumeric display device
Text (literary theory), a concept in literary theory
Text file, a type of computer files
Text messaging, the sending of short messages by mobile phone
TEXT, a Swedish band formed by 3/4 ex-Refused Members - TEXT is the band founded by Kristofer Steen, David Sandström, Fredrik Bäckström and Jon F Brännström.
Text segment, another name for the code segment of a binary executable computer file

milestones: Danish unofficial draft version of UNCCC treaty leaks, G77 reacts sharply
COP15, Alternative "texts" divide climate summit
Racially motivated text messages surface in other states
Full text of Ahmadinejad's letter to Bush made available online
Tom Baker launched as voice of BT text messaging
First charges laid over riot text messages
Study at the University of Toronto says text messaging helps with grammar
New text message encryption method developed
Singapore student is world's fastest text messenger
Flight lands safely with help from mobile phone text messages
Google doubles Gmail storage, adds text formatting
Coroner makes first post mortems of Athens airliner crash victims; text message was a hoax
Interview with LibriVox founder Hugh McGuire
Two New Zealand men ran illegal text lottery
Polish exercise book advertisement copies Wikipedia content, violates copyright
US candidate Barack Obama announces Joe Biden as his running mate via text message
New Zealand Commerce Commission investigating Australian company
Arizona applies ban on autodialers to mobile phone spam
Africa makes first draft version of UNCCC treaty, with harder goals
Security Council set to adopt non-binding text on N. Korea

wiki.text:
'Text' may refer to:
* the representation of written language
* Text (literary theory), a concept in literary theory
* Another name for a literary work
* A particular Bible passage, sometimes a single verse or verse fragment
* Textbook, a standardized instructional book *in electronic communication and
  computing ** Plain text (unformatted text) ** Text file, a type of computer
  files ** Text display, an electronic alphanumeric display device ** Text mode
  display ** Text messaging, the sending of short messages by mobile phone **
  Text segment, another name for the code segment of a binary executable
  computer file
* in arts and entertainment ** ''Text'' (song), a 2010 song by Mann ** TEXT, a
  Swedish band formed by 3/4 ex-Refused Members ** ''TxT'' (film), a 2006
  Filipino horror film
wiki.title: Text
